column5: Hi guys and gals,  I havent heard of anything on this subject since around April. Ive been looking on OOD magazine and the MNR site with no real updates. We cant afford to have them in our waterways, so any info as to whats happening or  sites to see and read would be appriciated.  Tight lines  Colin
Google it. This subject stirs all kinds of mixed feelings on a fishing forum. Similar to Cormorant threads Google is your friend
That's what forums are all about.. Opinions and mixed feelings  I have yet to see a Asian carp in person
They should just release them into the Don river. Then every time it overflows the fish carcasses left behind can fertilize the soil. Plus, i dont think anything survives in the Don.
No news is good news.  They would make the headlines if found in the Great lakes.  Let it never be
